Subroutine vom_write_dayyear

1486 : 
1487 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1488 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1489 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1490 : 
1491 :       subroutine vom_write_dayyear ()
1492 :       use vegwatmod
1493 :       use vegmod
1494 :       use watmod
1495 :       implicit none
1496 : 
1497 :       CHARACTER(60) :: dailyformat
1498 :       CHARACTER(3)  :: str
1499 : 
1500 : !     * internal write to convert from number to string
1501 :       write(str,'(i3)') nlayers_
1502 : !     * includes a column for each sublayer
1503 :       dailyformat = '(i6,i6,i4,i7,'//str//'e14.6)'
1504 : 
1505 :       write(kfile_resultsdaily,'(i6,i7,i7,i7,i7,25e15.5)') year(d___), &
1506 :      &  month(d___), day(d___), d___, h__, rainvec(d___), tmax(d___),  &
1507 :      &  tmin(d___), parvec(d___), vd_d / 24.d0, esoil_d, jmax25_(2),   &
1508 :      &  jmax25g(2), pc_ + pcg_(2), rl_d + rlg_d, lambda_, lambdag,     &
1509 :      &  rr_ * 3600.d0 * 24.d0, rrg * 3600.d0 * 24.d0, ass_d(2),        &
1510 :      &  assg_d(2,2), SUM(suvec_(1:nlayers_)) / nlayers_, ys_, wsnew_,  &
1511 :      &  spgfcf_d, infx_d, etm_d, etmg_d, suvec_(1), topt_
1512 :       write(kfile_rsurfdaily,dailyformat) year(d___), month(d___),     &
1513 :      &  day(d___), d___, rsurfvec(1:nlayers_)
1514 : 
1515 :       if (year(d___) .ne. yr_) then
1516 : !     * for calculation of vdyr a -1 is added to d___ for using dayyear of correct year
1517 :         write(kfile_yearly,'(i6,19e16.6)') yr_, rainyr, epanyr, paryr, &
1518 :      &  radyr, vdyr / (dayyear(d___ - 1)), evapyr, etyr, etmg_y,    &
1519 :    &  assg_y, rlg_y, rrg_y, cpccg_y, tcg_y,                          &
1520 :    &  etmt_y, asst_y, rlt_y, rrt_y, cpcct_y, tct_y
1521 :       endif
1522 : 
1523 : ! WRITING THE ACCUMULATED DATA FROM THE LAST YEAR TO FILE:
1524 : 
1525 :       if (d___ .eq. N__) then
1526 : !   * one more call of subroutine to write last day to yearly
1527 :     call vom_add_yearly()
1528 :       write(kfile_yearly,'(i6,19e16.6)') yr_, rainyr, epanyr, paryr, &
1529 :      &  radyr, vdyr / (dayyear(d___)), evapyr, etyr, etmg_y,               &
1530 :    &  assg_y, rlg_y, rrg_y, cpccg_y, tcg_y,                          &
1531 :    &  etmt_y, asst_y, rlt_y, rrt_y, cpcct_y, tct_y
1532 :       endif
1533 : 
1534 :       return
1535 :       end subroutine vom_write_dayyear
